text.content:
Nighty Night

Normal damage. Crit Effect: The target falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Unconscious]{Unconscious} and can't wake up until the end of its next turn.

Bludgeoning

Painful Poke

The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Stunned]{Stunned 1}.

Piercing

That'll Leave a Mark!

Normal damage. Crit Effect: The target takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed2d6.success].

Slashing

Devastating Strike

Triple damage. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Stunned]{Stunned 1}.

Bomb or Spell
